name: Know Social Media
tag_list: social-media, education, advice, internet, business, services, web-2-0
overview:
Know Social Media offers a range of services to help organisations of all kinds get the most out of social media.

Our aim is to encourage and help people use social media to improve the way they do things. After numerous workshops, one-on-one consultations, presentations and conversations with small businesses right around the Otago region, it became obvious that help navigating the mire of social media was sorely needed. With this in mind, Know Social Media was started to better manage the needs of organisations wanting to understand social media and how best to leverage its possibilities.

Know Social Media offers the following services:

  • Workshops: Tailored workshops and presentations designed for groups of all kinds.
  • Consultations: One-on-one consultations to look at your social media requirements.
  • Strategy: Analysis of current practice and planning for the future.
  • Referrals: Finding the right web developer or designer to meet your needs.

milestones.description: Finalist in Otago business excellence awards in the emerging business category.
